archimate:Requirement.name: AS.2.3.4f: f) the controls, processes and mechanisms in place to ensure availability of critical business applications, systems and networks should a service interruption occur (i.e. resilience)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
